Block MSHTA.EXE (.NET utilities)
Block MSDT.EXE (Troubleshooting Packs)
Block KD.EXE (Debuggers)
Block NTSD.EXE (Debuggers)
Block CDB.EXE (Debuggers)
Block BGINFO.EXE (Version 4.22 and below)
Block PRESENTATIONHOST.EXE (WPF Utilities)
Block MSXSL.EXE (COMMAND LINE XSLT)
Block CMSTP.EXE (CONNECTION MANAGER)
Block ODBCCONF.EXE (MDAC Utility)
Block CIPHER.EXE (File often used by ransomware)
Block SYNCAPPVPUBLISHINGSERVER.EXE
Block FSI.EXE (SDK Utility)
Block VSSADMIN.EXE (File often used by ransomware)
Block MAVINJECT32.EXE (APPLICATION VIRTUALIZATION)
Block FORFILES.EXE (WINDOWS)
Block ATBROKER.EXE (WINDOWS)
Block BASH.EXE (WINDOWS)
Block CSI.EXE (.NET Utilities)
Block DFSVC.EXE (.NET Utilities)
Block IEEXEC.EXE (.NET Utilities)
Block INSTALLUTIL.EXE (.NET Utilities)
Block MSBUILD.EXE (.NET Utilities)
Block REGASM.EXE (.NET Utilities)
Block REGSVCS.EXE (.NET Utilities)
Block FSIANYCPU.EXE (SDK Utility)
Block WMIC.EXE (WMI)
